lines.text: In the place from which I come, no person would dare sleep in insecure quarters.
If I do not receive blood within four chronoctons of time, I will have no need of emotion.

[speaking telepathically]
It is impossible for you to escape. Come to me!

[speaking telepathically]
I hear you! You can't hurt me now! It doesn't work now!

[speaking telepathically]
It's a lie! I am not so injured!
